entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait in the morning. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
